init_hook: git remote get-url npm-template >/dev/null 2>&1 || git remote add -f npm-template https://github.com/FMI-MediaMaster/NpmTemplate.git

grep -q 'Description for package' package.json && echo -e "
!! Please remember to change the project description in package.json !!" >&2

scripts.pull:template: git fetch npm-template && git rebase npm-template/main
